step.sql: INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK (PID) (SELECT LINK_PID FROM RD_LINK WHERE MESH_ID [mesh]);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_LINK_NAMEGID (PID) (SELECT DISTINCT P.NAME_GROUPID FROM RD_LINK_NAME P, TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID = T.PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_LINK_NAMEID (PID) (SELECT P.NAME_ID FROM RD_NAME P, TEMP_RD_LINK_NAMEGID T WHERE P.NAME_GROUPID = T.PID);
SELECT P.* FROM RD_LINK P,TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_LINK_FORM P,TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_LINK_NAME P,TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_NAME P,TEMP_RD_LINK_NAMEID T WHERE P.NAME_ID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_LINK_SPEEDLIMIT P,TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID=T.PID;
